call_to_action.title: Join the Movement Elevate Together
call_to_action.description: Altiora is the social fitness platform where athletes, creators, and everyday movers share their journey. Connect with communities, discover workouts, and unlock your next level

params.footer_description: Altiora is a community-driven fitness platform built to empower and elevate together. Share your workouts, join challenges, and grow stronger with the world

metadata.meta_description: Altiora is the fitness-first social video platform. Empower & Elevate Together — join communities, share workouts, and discover the future of fitness
